brailleSimulator.InvalidInputException

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void BrailleClient.setCellPin(int cell, int pin, boolean state)
      Sets a specific pin of a specific cell to a specific state.
      void Braille.setCellPin(int cell, int pin, boolean state)
      Sets a specific pin of a specific cell to a specified state.
      void Cell.setPin(int num, boolean state)
      Sets a specific pin to a specified state corresponding to the num and state given.
      void Cell.setPinConfig(java.lang.String pinConfig)
      Sets the state of each pin corresponding to the pinConfig argument given with the first pin corresponding to first character of pinConfig and so on.
      void BrailleClient.translate(java.lang.String message)
      Translates a String message based on English Braille alphabet into an array of Strings, each String being 8 characters long and consisting of 1s and 0s and updates the GUI according with red and black rectangles.
      void Braille.translate(java.lang.String message)
      Translates a String message based on English Braille alphabet into an array of Strings, each String being 8 characters long and consisting of 1s and 0s.
